last_episode_to_air.name: Storm Chasers 2010: Behind the Storm
last_episode_to_air.overview: Behind the scenes with cast and crew.

name: Storm Chasers
overview: Anyone who has seen "The Wizard of Oz" knows that an oncoming tornado is nothing to trifle with, but "extreme filmmaker" Sean Casey takes viewers right into the heart of Tornado Alley and inside the storms themselves to capture valuable research data and unprecedented footage.

episodes.name: Opening Pursuits
episodes.overview: IMAX filmmaker Sean Casey and research meteorologist Josh Wurman head out to intercept one of nature's most deadly creations, tornadoes. Their team follows the first tornado of the season as it hits Tulia, Texas, and ultimately destroys the town.

episodes.name: A Dangerous Ride
episodes.overview: After a week spent drifting around Kansas waiting for a calm spell to end, the crew is on the hunt. They chase a huge mesocyclone across a wilderness area completely devoid of paved roads, making the storm virtually impossible to intercept.

episodes.name: Tornado Aftermath
episodes.overview: Five weeks into their storm chasing season, IMAX filmmaker Sean Casey and meteorologist Josh Wurman are under the gun to intercept a tornado. Conflict between Josh and Sean reach new heights, and Sean begins to trust his instincts over Josh's science.

episodes.name: Direct Hit
episodes.overview: It's nearing the end of the tornado season, and although the team has collected record-breaking data, Sean has yet to get his one shot. While on their way to Woodward, Oklahoma, a tornado forms earlier than expected.

episodes.name: Tornado Intercept Tank
episodes.overview: Storm season starts out deadly, and Josh and Sean race to get a bigger, badder Tornado Intercept Vehicle, TIV-2, on the road. Meanwhile, a new force of nature emerges in Tornado Alley as Reed Timmer beats the pros to get incredible tornado intercepts.

episodes.name: When Parts Fly
episodes.overview: Sean's new TIV-2 chases a promising storm, but vehicle parts fly for all the wrong reasons. Reed's team pursues a monster storm as it bears down on the town of Lamesa Texas.

episodes.name: Mutiny on the Plains
episodes.overview: Tensions mount between Sean and Josh, as Reed offers to chase with the TIV. Reed chases a risky nighttime tornado into the hills of Arkansas, while Sean and Josh return to Greensburg, Kansas one year after a twister nearly wiped the town off the map.

episodes.name: Nightmare on DOW Street
episodes.overview: TIV-1 makes a heroic return, but the tables turn as a monster EF-4 tornado chases the storm chasers through eastern Arkansas.

episodes.name: Road Hazards
episodes.overview: The DOW Team's in chaos as a broken radar sends Josh scrambling to fix it. Reed jumps on the opportunity to scoop the science team once again, while Danny and Aaron struggle to escape a ditch before a tornado gets too close.

episodes.name: No Place Like Kansas
episodes.overview: With the DOW truck and all the research vehicles functioning once again, the team finds themselves hunting in the same territory as their rival Reed Timmer. Tornadoes are forming all over western Kansas on what looks like the biggest day of the season.

episodes.name: Hail to the Beast
episodes.overview: Reed and Josh's teams struggle to find the perfect storm in Nebraska. Reed's girlfriend Jene gets lost in a deadly hailstorm while the DOW team mistakenly drives into an on-coming tornado.

episodes.name: Tornado Showdown
episodes.overview: As tornado season comes to a close, Sean has one last chance to get the shot of all shots from inside a tornado, while Reed pushes his team to the edge, getting closer to a twister than ever before.

episodes.name: Storm Catchers
episodes.overview: Tornado season erupts early in Oklahoma. Reed gets his new Dominator too close. Tim chases multiples, and Sean battles a rain-wrapped monster.

episodes.name: Bigger in Texas
episodes.overview: Sean and Reed face off at the New Mexico border. Monster tornados break up everything in their paths, except the tension.

episodes.name: Highway to Hail
episodes.overview: Reed steps up his science to take on Dr. Josh Wurman's massive research project. Joel has second thoughts. The fallout reaches Sean, who makes a drastic decision.

episodes.name: Inside the Tornado
episodes.overview: Reed's new radar propels him from aggressive chaser to extreme scientist, inside an EF3.

episodes.name: Not in Kansas Anymore
episodes.overview: Reed, Sean and Tim take on the strongest tornado conditions of the season, and nature responds with twisters too close to home.

episodes.name: Fight or Flight
episodes.overview: Both Tim Samaras and the TIV team face off with a dangerous tornado. Reed pushes too close, and finds no place to hide.

episodes.name: Sean Casey at the Bat
episodes.overview: Sean Casey's meteorologists finally put him in position for the shot of a lifetime, and this time it's a home run. Reed, Tim, and Josh all score big.

episodes.name: EF-3 Strikes You're Out
episodes.overview: On the last chase of the season in Nebraska, Reed and Tim chase multiple vortices. But when an EF-3 monster touches down right on top of Reed's armored research vehicle, Mother Nature shows who really dominates in Tornado Alley.  Watch on Prime Video

episodes.name: Greatest Storms 2008
episodes.overview: Extreme chasers Reed Timmer, Joel Taylor, IMAX Filmmaker Sean Casey, and Tim Samaras present their most exciting tornado chasing moments.

episodes.name: What Goes Around...
episodes.overview: Reed and Joel bury the hatchet to face a new tornado season, but armor offers little protection when the roof blows off the new Dominator. Sean mixes up his crew and unleashes tension in the path of a west Texas twister.

episodes.name: Why We Chase
episodes.overview: The deadliest tornado of the season tears a hundred mile path across Mississippi, destroying 600 homes and the town of Yazoo City. For Reed, Joel and Chris, an epic chase turns into a race to save lives, and changes their own lives forever.

episodes.name: Back Seat Driver
episodes.overview: After the worst tornado in his life, Reed pursues a new force of nature in TV weather woman Ginger Zee. But chasing more than weather leaves teammates out in the cold. As twisters rip through the Ozarks, one long-time chaser calls it quits.

episodes.name: Dedication
episodes.overview: Sean finally gives the reigns to his meteorologist-navigator Matt Hughes, who leads the team to their best tornado intercept ever. Then triumph turns to tragedy as Storm Chasers loses one of its own.

episodes.name: Smoke Monster
episodes.overview: Sean's team struggles with the death of a teammate, and heightened emotions lead to questionable driving. Reed arms the Dominator with probe cannons, while Tim smokes out a South Dakota monster that just keeps growing.

episodes.name: Perfect Storm
episodes.overview: South Dakota spins up the twister of the season, and the non-stop tornado action leaves no room for drama.

episodes.name: Twister Twilight Zone
episodes.overview: Reed's cannons are locked and loaded, but multiple tornados prove a hard target for an itchy trigger finger. Tim's team chases in the tornado twilight zone, while Sean weathers a storm of controversy.

episodes.name: Judgement Day
episodes.overview: Storm and chasers collide in Minnesota for a final showdown. As a ferocious EF-4 twister targets the town of Wadena, one team finds themselves in the wrong place at the right time, and Sean's trial by fire becomes a race to save others.

episodes.name: Behind the Storm
episodes.overview: This special features interviews and documentary footage with the show's production crew, explaining how they accompany the storm chasing teams and the difficulties they encounter working under intense conditions. It shows the main camera angles too.

episodes.name: Greatest Storms 2009
episodes.overview: Extreme chasers Reed Timmer, Joel Taylor, IMAX Filmmaker Sean Casey, and meteorologist Dr. Josh Wurman present their most exciting tornado chasing moments.

episodes.name: Dixie Alley Outbreak
episodes.overview: In the worst tornado outbreak in over half a century, Mississippi and Alabama are ravaged by hundreds of twisters. Towns are wiped clean off the map, and hundreds of people lose their lives.

episodes.name: Storms Over St. Louis
episodes.overview: On the first chase of the year, there's a storm headed toward downtown St. Louis. While Tim Samaras and his team chase too close to the beast, Reed Timmer's team is on the verge of falling apart.

episodes.name: Reed's Redemption
episodes.overview: After failing to find a twister on two consecutive chases, Reed Timmer and the Dominator team are desperate to chase one down. They're even desperate enough to pursue a powerful storm into an urban area after dark, one of the most dangerous possible chasing scenarios. Team TWISTEX's truck threatens to keep them on the sidelines on a promising tornado day. While team Dominator pursues an intercept, the TIV team is hoping to finally shoot their first ever 3D tornado footage... but tension in the vehicle has everyone on edge, and the crew is finding out that the only thing worse than having a chase ruined by the slick, Texas mud is to be helpless in the path of a tornado.

episodes.name: Aftermath
episodes.overview: In the wake of the deadly and very large tornado outbreak (April 27, 2011), all three chase teams take time to help with the recovery effort. Team Tiv is in Smithville, Mississippi and Team Dominator and Team Twistex are in Tuscaloosa, Alabama. Motivated by the death and destruction they've witnessed, all three teams are rededicated to improving warning times and doing vital research on these deadly storms. Team Dominator fields a new, improved vehicle: the Dominator 2 and tracks a storm right toward one member's childhood home. Team TWISTEX outfits their truck with a brand new probe and a mobile Doppler radar, but mechanical issues threaten to sideline them again. Team TIV adds a mobile tornado siren and chases toward the heart of a twister to warn people while shooting 3D twister footage.

episodes.name: No Rest for the Weary
episodes.overview: Reed Timmer and his team take the day off, but when Sean Casey's team scores a victory in Reed's own backyard, the meteorologist vows to chase with a vengeance. Meanwhile, Tim Samaras grows more cautious chasing storms in Kansas.

episodes.name: Too Close to Home
episodes.overview: A tornado outbreak threatens to wreak havoc in Reed Timmer's backyard. Sean Casey's team follows their navigator's bold prediction, and tension threatens to derail Tim Samaras' chase on a huge day.

episodes.name: The Storm Within
episodes.overview: Team Dominator risks everything to warn people in the path of a violent storm, but internal conflicts causes driver Joel to leave, complicating Team Dominator's operations. Still gun shy after witnessing devastation this season, Sean Casey starts to lack the passion of chasing storms, until a visit from his wife and a successful chase reignites Team TIV's fire. Team TWISTEX tries to brave the elements by chasing a tornado through a hail storm, but after their vehicles suffer damage, Tim has to swallow his pride and abandon the chase.

episodes.name: All or Nothing
episodes.overview: On the last chase of the season, Reed Timmer's team chases a monster tornado for a radar intercept, and Tim Samaras' team has one last chance to deploy their probe in its path.

episodes.name: Storm Chasers 2010: Behind the Storm
episodes.overview: Behind the scenes with cast and crew.
